errors.error_description: Added a specific plotly version (5.2.1) that may be incompatible with the latest dash-bio version, potentially causing version conflicts.
correction_candidates: Remove the plotly version specification to use the latest compatible version

Add a note explaining why this specific plotly version is required
errors.golden_answer: Remove the plotly version specification to use the latest compatible version
